title: One Bedroom CONDO
map_address: 10 Moss Avenue Unit 28 near Oakland Avenue
posting_body: Live in the Grand Lake/Rose Garden area!
The unit is located on the second floor, there no steps into the elevator.
Gated building, off street parking, covered parking space for one vehicle.
Community shared laundry in the building.

This lovely location offers easy access to freeway, express buses to San Francisco, plenty of restaurants, movie theaters, coffee shops, Kaiser medical center, MacArthur Bart Station, and plenty of shopping.
Also near Piedmont and Grand Lake/Lakeshore Districts.
**Pets are negotiable as well as the security deposit per pet.
*(1) application per adult, is $35.00 for credit check per applicant.
